Q0hBTVBJT05fRklOQUxTX1VfQkVUX0RFU0M=.v:
Players from all over the world will be competing for the title of Grandmaster!

Using the interface on the left, you can watch and wager on battles. Earn rewards when the player you wager on wins!

Keep an eye on your winnings and collect your rewards. Good luck!

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzE=.v: - During the 2-day registration phase, any player who fulfills the level requirement may register for the event.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzI=.v: - Based on the number of registered players, multiple rounds of Tryouts will carried out to determine the top 64 players.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzM=.v: - Players will be randomly assigned into groups for the Elimation phase and a finalist from each group will be determined. The finalists will enter the final phase and play for the title of Grandmaster.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzQ=.v: - Wagers will begin with the Elimination phase! Place a wager on a favorite and earn rewards when that player wins!

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzU=.v: - Before the start of the first Elimination battle (Top 64), you can wager on the eventual winner with Grandmaster Pick to win additional rewards!

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzY=.v: - The amount of Gems wagered on the players will change the odds for Wagers and Grandmaster Selection in real time. Your Payout is based on the odds when the wager is made. After the rewards are sent, collect them at [Elimination] - [My Wagers] before the event ends.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzc=.v: - You can view match results and collect rewards at [Rank Rewards] after a match has ended.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9HRVRfREVTQzg=.v: - You'll be ranked according to your Wager Points. In case of a draw, both players will be ranked by their Wager win counts and amount of Gems wagered.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9SVUxFX0RFU0Mx.v: - This is Deck Heroes' most ambitious event yet! Players from all over the world will be competing for rewards and the coveted title of Grandmaster.

Q0hBTVBJT05fSEVMUF9SVUxFX0RFU0My.v: - The Grandmaster Cup is divided into three phases: Registration, Tryouts, and Elimination.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMjY=.v: Creatures with [Stoneskin] and [Immunity] will not be affected by [Retreat] and [Instakill].

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMjc=.v: Careful deck organization and full understanding of Creatures are the first steps to becoming a master.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMjg=.v: Don't hold back now! Give it all you've got!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMjk=.v: Summon Flame Brave before Bloom Warden to benefit from its higher Attack.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMw==.v: Lost a battle? Even with a full deck? Try switching to manual control and placing Creatures according to their advantages and disadvantages.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzA=.v: Gain the upper hand by allowing your opponent to summon his Creatures first.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzE=.v: Summon the Flame Brave and the Bloom Warden into play together, and then, attack with full force!!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzI=.v: Set the Flame Brave and Wood Patrol before the Bloom Warden to keep your healer from being targeted as much as possible.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzM=.v: Enhance the Flame Brave to level 5 to unlock a new skill.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzQ=.v: For best results, place your Creature with the highest ATK across from the Frost Warden.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzU=.v: The Frost Warden has low Health, defeat it quickly with your stronger Creatures!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzY=.v: Summon multiple Creatures simultaneously will reduce the chances of having your stronger Creatures controlled by Frost Warden.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzc=.v: Bone Mage has a strong Magic attack, kill it first to secure victory.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzg=.v: The Flame Mage may wield powerful magic, but not as powerful as our Flame Brave!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfMzk=.v: Enhance your Creatures to improve your chances of winning!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNA==.v: Our opponents are getting stronger! Try to enhance all your Cards to Lv.5 before proceeding!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDA=.v: The Frost Rager shall be your trump card against Creatures with high ATK.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDE=.v: Beware the Elite Swordsman's status-inflicting skills. Get rid of him as soon as possible!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDI=.v: Place a Creature with the Frost Armor (e.g. Frost Rager) at the leftmost side to soak up as much physical DMG as possible.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDM=.v: A Creature with Ravage has its advantage against Human Creatures. Try using Desert Sting for this skill!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDQ=.v: Enhance Frost Rager to unlock her stronger skills. Her continued survival will help keep your weaker Creatures unharmed.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDU=.v: The Protector will reflect all of Flame Brave's Magic attacks, defeat it first!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDY=.v: The Faen Marksman has the potential to deal a lot of physical damage. Focus on defeating her first.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDc=.v: The Border Ranger's Sweeping Blow can potentially wipe the floor with your Creatures, but the Frost Rager can greatly reduce the DMG inflicted.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDg=.v: The Royal Knight is strong against physical attacks, keep your spellcasters alive to defeat it quickly!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNDk=.v: Include mass-healing Creatures in your deck to survive constant attacks from enemies.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNQ==.v: When facing opponents with ATK- boosting skills, Creatures with Frost Armor will render them powerless.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTA=.v: Against Creatures that boost ATK when attacked, hit them hard and fast before they can attack!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTE=.v: When against creatures with physical resisting skills, pummel them with Magic attacks!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTI=.v: If battles drag on too long, consider adding Creatures that resist Magic DMG to your deck.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTM=.v: There are many ways to handle status-inflicting Creatures, such as using nullification skills or mass-summoning Creatures to attack in one fell swoop.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTQ=.v: Include mass-healing Creatures in your deck to survive constant attacks from enemies.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTU=.v: Enemy Creatures that can constantly revive may be a hassle. Try killing the enemy Hero before they return to the field again.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTY=.v: Selecting Creatures with anti-Neander skills will greatly aid in a battle against Neanders.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTc=.v: Always enhance your Creatures! Having a higher Total Health would help greatly in battle!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTg=.v: Immunity and healing skills can reduce the effects of Plague and Afflict, but the best course of action is to destroy the enemy quickly.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNTk=.v: When facing Creatures that strengthen each other with Buffs, target the weakest creature first.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNg==.v: Unable to gain an advantage with your Creatures? Enhance them and try again!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjA=.v: A high-leveled Reflect skill can effectively wipe out a deck of magic-based Creatures.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjE=.v: When battling against multiple buffers and spellcaster Creatures, always kill the spellcasters first.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjI=.v: Magic attacks can easily overcome the challenges of Frost Armor and Block.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjM=.v: When facing Creatures with Reflect, don't hold back on ATK-boosting Creatures. However, try to avoid direct engagement when the enemy Hero casts Dodge!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjQ=.v: Using Sweeping Blow against Creatures with counterattack skills can be suicidal. Magic attack works best against such Creatures.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjU=.v: Make full use of Bane when up against Phoenix, else, it will show you the true power of magic!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjY=.v: Reflect is the bane of magic-based Creatures. Also try to avoid going head-on with Creatures that have Counterattack skills.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjc=.v: Make full use of healer Creatures and keep all Creatures above 45% HP, unless your deck consists of Creatures that specialize in magic.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjg=.v: Use Heroes that are 2-stars and above to boost your winning odds!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNjk=.v: Creatures with Magic attacks have no fear of ATK-weakening skills!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNw==.v: When facing Creatures with ATK-boosting skills, [Frost Armor] is a godsend.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzA=.v: Use Maji Shield and healing skills to overcome Creatures with Detonate.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzE=.v: Use Creatures with Heal to counter the effects of Inferno

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzI=.v: Increase your DMG output in order to prevent Creatures with Revive skill from returning to the field.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzM=.v: Creatures with [Unbound] will be invulnerable to skills that skip attacks or actions.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzU=.v: Frost Armor works best against enemies with high ATK and can reduce the effectiveness of Life Sap.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzY=.v: So you think you can beat me with your puny Hero? Go get a 2-star Hero from the Bazaar!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzc=.v: Destroy enemy Creatures quickly to prevent your Hero from taking DMG.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzg=.v: Creatures with high level Reflect can easily dominate here!

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfNzk=.v: Finish off the Great Mystic with the Bullseye skill, and the rest of the battle would be a breeze.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOA==.v: A healer Creature is invaluable when your Creatures are inflicted by [Gas Cloud].

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODA=.v: Creatures with Immunity and Reflect skills are the key to victory in this battle.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODE=.v: Defeat the Flame Brave first. The remaining Creatures are just mere nuisances.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODI=.v: Having many Creatures that possess multi-targeting magic would make this battle a breeze -- Beware of the Great Mystic though.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODM=.v: After restraining the Venom Tyrant, the only problem left is just Abaddon...

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODQ=.v: Beware! The Moon Guardian and Royal Dancer can exceed Mimir's Tree's ATK when Pursuit is activated.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODU=.v: Another skill as noteworthy as the Great Mystic's Revive, is the Flame Mage's Blaze.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODY=.v: Combining Frost Armor and healing skills can easily take down any Creatures that rely on physical attacks, no matter how powerful they are.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODc=.v: Breaking through the Great Mystic-Hippolyta combination is the key to winning this battle.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODg=.v: A Creature with [Frost Armor] works well against Creatures that rely on physical attacks.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfODk=.v: When battling a predominantly Neander deck, use status-inflicting Creatures to reduce their high ATK and large HP.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOQ==.v: When facing a Venom Tyrant that boasts a monstrous amount of ATK, use [Frost Armor] to mitigate the DMG or quickly dispose of other enemy Creatures.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTA=.v: A good way to avoid taking unnecessary DMG against Creatures with multi-targeting magic, is to overwhelm them by summoning all your Creatures in a single turn.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTE=.v: Enemy Creatures that can constantly revive may be a hassle. Try killing the enemy Hero before they return to the field again.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTI=.v: Human Creatures possess very high ATK. Try inflicting statuses or reducing their ATK with multi-target Skills.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTM=.v: Creatures with status-nullifying skills are practically invincible against status-inflicting Creatures.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTQ=.v: Finding it difficult to win with brute force? Try using Magic attacks to tear away at the enemy instead.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTU=.v: When your Hero is critically low on Health, deploy Creatures with defensive skills.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTY=.v: If attacking with magic is ineffective, switch to another tactic.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTc=.v: When battling a predominantly Neander deck, use status-inflicting Creatures to reduce their high ATK and large HP.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTg=.v: The most effective strategy against Neander Creatures is to employ ATK-weakening skills.

RkFJTFVSRV9USVBfOTk=.v: Deploy Creatures with anti-magic and anti-status skills to have peace of mind during your relentless attacks.

Sk9JTlRfV0FSX0JBU0VfQ0FNUF9SVUxFX0RFU0Mx.v: - Faction War consists of 3 Zones. You can join a Zone once daily. Once you select a zone, you can't switch to another for the rest of the day. The event ends when either Faction occupies two or more Zones.

Sk9JTlRfV0FSX0JBU0VfQ0FNUF9SVUxFX0RFU0My.v: - A Troop Insignia will be deducted when a Faction loses on a Lane. The Zone will be lost when a Faction loses all their Troop Insignias on any Lane. In the event of a tie, the Faction with more players wins the Zone.

Sk9JTlRfV0FSX0JBU0VfQ0FNUF9SVUxFX0RFU0Mz.v: - Earn Merits by deploying your deck in Faction War. Get more Merits to win fabulous rewards. You'll also be ranked based on your Merits for bigger prizes at the end of the event!

Sk9JTlRfV0FSX0JBU0VfQ0FNUF9SVUxFX0RFU0M0.v: - Earn Medals by Donating Lumber. You'll be ranked based on your Medals for bigger prizes at the end of the event!

Sk9JTlRfV0FSX0NIT09TRV9GT1JDRV9SVUxFX0RF.v: - You must pick a Faction at the start of the event. You can't switch Factions until the event ends.
- Incentives will be given to players who join weaker Factions.
- Rare prizes will be awarded to the top players of each Faction.
- Event Prizes will be awarded to all players in the winning Faction.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzE=.v: 1.During the Guild Battle period, players can sign up to deliver the treasure to their Guild Vault.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzI=.v: 2.Couriers with more Heroes and Creatures of higher Star ratings will be able to deliver more treasure.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzM=.v: 3.During a delivery, there is a chance that the treasure may get plundered by players from other Guilds.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzQ=.v: 4.The destruction of enemy Heroes and Creatures in a Guild Battle will yield additional treasure.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzU=.v: 5.Players in a successful plunder will obtain 75% of the Treasure and start on a delivery of their own.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzY=.v: 6.During the Guild Battle, Heroes and Creatures will not recover their HP after a fight. Heroes and Creatures destroyed will be revived after a cooldown period.

TEVHSU9OX1dBUl9IRUxQX1JVTEVfREVTQzc=.v: 7.After the Guild Battle, rewards will be given out based on the Guild's and player's treasure ranking. All rewards will be sent within an hour after the Guild Battle.

UFZQX0dPRFNfSEVMUF9SVUxFX0RFU0M5.v: 9. Protection periods can be bought to prevent other players from challenging your Halls. Protection durations stack with multiple purchases.

4oCc5qKm5aKD5LmL5Yid77yM54Gr5Yaw55u45o6l.k: “梦境之初，火冰相接”，我想我知道了。
4oCc5qKm5aKD5LmL5Yid77yM54Gr5Yaw55u45o6l.v: "Everything starts in a dream of fire and ice." I think I know what that means now.

4oCm4oCm5ZSU77yM6Jm954S2546w5Zyo5oiR5Lus.k: ……唔，虽然现在我们怨灵缠身，不过如果在海底，被烈焰净化，我还是无法接受呢……
4oCm4oCm5ZSU77yM6Jm954S2546w5Zyo5oiR5Lus.v: I may be possessed by Mortii, but I'm quite sure I don't want to be roasted!

4oCm4oCm77yI6I6r6Z2e5piv56We5Li75LmL6Ze0.k: ……（莫非是神主之间有什么约定？）

5LiA5Liq6YO95LiN6IO95bCR77yM6KaB5L+d6K+B.k: 一个都不能少，要保证强大的攻击没有短板。

5LiA5YiH5bmz6KGh55qE5a2Y5Zyo77yM5omN5piv.k: 一切平衡的存在，才是生存之道。
5LiA5YiH5bmz6KGh55qE5a2Y5Zyo77yM5omN5piv.v: Balance is the key to survival.

5LiA5Z2X57qq5b+15L2g5rC45oGS576e6IC755qE.k: 一块纪念你永恒羞耻的文字碑从此矗立。
5LiA5Z2X57qq5b+15L2g5rC45oGS576e6IC755qE.v: A monument will be built to commemorate your utter humiliation.

5LiA5a6a5piv5rKZ5ryg5Lit5b6F5LmF5LqG77yM.k: 一定是沙漠中待久了，我刚刚感觉有一道黄光从面前闪过。
5LiA5a6a5piv5rKZ5ryg5Lit5b6F5LmF5LqG77yM.v: We must have been stuck in the desert for too long. These yellow lights keep flashing before my eyes.

5LiA5pem5p2Q5paZ5Ya254K85a6M5q+V5oiW6ICF.k: 一旦材料冶炼完毕或者通过其他途径获得的材料，都会进入你的储物箱内。
5LiA5pem5p2Q5paZ5Ya254K85a6M5q+V5oiW6ICF.v: All materials received or smelted will be sent to your Stash.

5LiA54K56YO95LiN5aWH5oCq77yM5pyJ5pe25YCZ.k: 一点都不奇怪，有时候精神的伤害，远远比肉体的伤害更加致命。
5LiA54K56YO95LiN5aWH5oCq77yM5pyJ5pe25YCZ.v: That's normal. Sometimes, mental damage can be much more debilitating then physical harm.

5LiH54mp6YO96ISx56a75LiN5LqG6Ieq54S25rOV.k: 万物都脱离不了自然法则的束缚
5LiH54mp6YO96ISx56a75LiN5LqG6Ieq54S25rOV.v: The law of nature is all-encompassing.

5LiH54mp6YO96L+b5YWl5Yaw5bCB5rKJ552h5Y67.k: 万物都进入冰封沉睡去吧

5LiH6Zu35aSp54mi5Y+v5Lul6K6p6Ieq5bex6Zm3.k: 万雷天牢可以让自己陷入无尽狂乱，从而消耗极少的怒气释放英雄技能。
5LiH6Zu35aSp54mi5Y+v5Lul6K6p6Ieq5bex6Zm3.v: Legion's Frenzy allows Hero Skills to be activated at a lower Rage cost.

5LiK5Zy65pe25aaC5oiR5pa55oiY5Zy65pyJ6ZqP.k: 上场时如我方战场有随从，则随机消灭一个(无法免疫)，使自己的攻击力、生命值和生命值上限提高#0%
5LiK5Zy65pe25aaC5oiR5pa55oiY5Zy65pyJ6ZqP.v: Randomly destroy 1 of your other Creatures and increase ATK and HP by #0%. This effect cannot be negated.

5LiK5aSp57uZ5oiR5LqG5pS+6YCQ5L2g5Lus55qE.k: 上天给我了放逐你们的权利。
5LiK5aSp57uZ5oiR5LqG5pS+6YCQ5L2g5Lus55qE.v: The gods have granted me dominion over you!

5LiN5LmF5LmL5ZCO77yM5Lqh54G15Yab5Zui5bCx.k: 不久之后，亡灵军团就会统治整个世界。
5LiN5LmF5LmL5ZCO77yM5Lqh54G15Yab5Zui5bCx.v: Before long, the Mortii shall conquer the world!

5LiN5Lya55qE77yM6K+35pS+5b+D77yILi4uLi4u.k: 不会的，请放心（......你们一个个都突然变强了，我还怎么大意。）
5LiN5Lya55qE77yM6K+35pS+5b+D77yILi4uLi4u.v: Oh, don't worry. Everyone's so strong now. I can't afford to be careless anyway.

5LiN5YGP5LiN5YCa5Zyw5omn6KGM6KOB5Yaz44CC.v: All are equal before the hand of justice!

5LiN5Y+X5Yiw5Lu75L2V6ZqP5LuO5Y+K6Iux6ZuE.k: 不受到任何随从及英雄的技能造成的伤害及影响
5LiN5Y+X5Yiw5Lu75L2V6ZqP5LuO5Y+K6Iux6ZuE.v: Grants protection from DMG and effects from all skills.

5LiN5Y+X5aS66a2E44CB5Ye76YCA44CB5q275Lqh.k: 不受夺魄、击退、死亡放逐技能影响
5LiN5Y+X5aS66a2E44CB5Ye76YCA44CB5q275Lqh.v: Grants protection from Instakill, Retreat, and Disposal.

5LiN5Y+X5aS66a2E44CB5Ye76YCA44CB5q275Lqh.k: 不受夺魄、击退、死亡放逐等秒杀类技能影响,并且免疫降低攻击力的负面技能
5LiN5Y+X5aS66a2E44CB5Ye76YCA44CB5q275Lqh.v: Immune to Retreat, Instakill, Disposal and negative effects that decrease ATK.

5LiN5ZaE55qE5p2l6ICF77yM5oiR5bCG55So6ZW/.k: 不善的来者，我将用长矛刺穿你布满尘埃的心脏！
5LiN5ZaE55qE5p2l6ICF77yM5oiR5bCG55So6ZW/.v: Unsavory visitor, my spear shall thrust deep into your dust-filled heart!

5LiN5aW977yM5oiR5Lus6L+b5LqG6JmO56m077yB.k: 不好，我们进了虎穴！快跑！
5LiN5aW977yM5oiR5Lus6L+b5LqG6JmO56m077yB.v: Run, fool! You'll be eaten alive!

5LiN5aW977yM546L5p2D5aOB5Z6S5pyJ5Y2x6Zmp.k: 不好，王权壁垒有危险。你们快点去解救他吧。
5LiN5aW977yM546L5p2D5aOB5Z6S5pyJ5Y2x6Zmp.v: Oh no, the Royal Guard is in danger. Go rescue him.

5LiN5oCV56We5LiA5qC355qE5a+55omL77yM5bCx.k: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友。
5LiN5oCV56We5LiA5qC355qE5a+55omL77yM5bCx.v: A bumbling ally will kill you faster than the deadliest enemy.

5LiN5pep6K+077yM5oiR5bey57uP6LWw6L+b5rOV.k: 不早说，我已经走进法阵了。
5LiN5pep6K+077yM5oiR5bey57uP6LWw6L+b5rOV.v: Well, why didn't you say so earlier? I've already walked into the magical setup.

5LiN5piv5omA5pyJ55qE6Zi05b2x6YO96LGh5b6B.k: 不是所有的阴影都象征着黑暗。
5LiN5piv5omA5pyJ55qE6Zi05b2x6YO96LGh5b6B.v: Not all that is shrouded is dark. Not all those in shadow are vile.

5LiN5piv6ZSZ6KeJ77yM5piv6Juu6I2S55qE55a+.k: 不是错觉，是蛮荒的疾风掠夺者，快速而又残忍的豹族人。
5LiN5piv6ZSZ6KeJ77yM5piv6Juu6I2S55qE55a+.v: I'm not imagining things. It's a Neander Zora Marauder, an agile and vicious being.

5LiN5q275aWR57qm5YWl5Zy65Y+R5Yqo5pe2LOaI.k: 不死契约入场发动时,我方战场每存在一个亡灵随从,所有亡灵随从将永久增加#0点生命值与生命值上限
5LiN5q275aWR57qm5YWl5Zy65Y+R5Yqo5pe2LOaI.v: If Unholy Pact activates, the HP and max HP of your Mortii Creatures permanently increases by #0 for each Mortii Creature in play that you control.

5LiN55So5aaE5Zu+6YCD6ISx77yM5oiR55qE566t.k: 不用妄图逃脱，我的箭，会自动找寻你的心脏。
5LiN55So5aaE5Zu+6YCD6ISx77yM5oiR55qE566t.v: There is no escaping my arrows.

5LiN55So5pGG6ISx77yM5LiN5pat55qE6YCB5aW5.k: 不用摆脱，不断的送她往生就好。
5LiN55So5pGG6ISx77yM5LiN5pat55qE6YCB5aW5.v: No need to shake her off. Simply guide her to the afterlife.

5LiN55So6LCm6K6p77yM6JGs6YCB5Zyo6L+Z6YeM.k: 不用谦让，葬送在这里只是迟早的事！
5LiN55So6LCm6K6p77yM6JGs6YCB5Zyo6L+Z6YeM.v: No need for formalities. You'll be dead once I'm done with you!

5LiN566h5LqG77yM5omT6La05YaN6K+044CC.v: Oh, forget it. Let our fists do the talking.

5LiN6KaB5Lul5Li65ryC5Lqu5bCx6IO95Lmx56Kw.k: 不要以为漂亮就能乱碰，带给你的可全是伤害。
5LiN6KaB5Lul5Li65ryC5Lqu5bCx6IO95Lmx56Kw.v: Every rose has its thorns... and here are mine!

5LiN6KaB5Lyk5a6z6L+Z6YeM55qE5LiA6I2J5LiA.k: 不要伤害这里的一草一木，那都是我的兄弟姐妹。
5LiN6KaB5Lyk5a6z6L+Z6YeM55qE5LiA6I2J5LiA.v: Every blade of grass here is my friend. Don't hurt them!

5LiN6KaB5YCS5LiL77yM5ZCm5YiZ5oiR5Lya5aaC.k: 不要倒下，否则我会如同活物般啜饮你的鲜血。
5LiN6KaB5YCS5LiL77yM5ZCm5YiZ5oiR5Lya5aaC.v: I will shred your corpse and suck your veins dry.

5LiN6KaB5a6z5oCV77yM6YKj5piv5oiR5rKJ552h.k: 不要害怕，那是我沉睡已久的战斗之心。
5LiN6KaB5a6z5oCV77yM6YKj5piv5oiR5rKJ552h.v: Do not be afraid. That is just my power awakening.

5LiN6KaB5oub5oO55YWF5ruh54G854Ot5LuH5oGo.k: 不要招惹充满灼热仇恨的生物。
5LiN6KaB5oub5oO55YWF5ruh54G854Ot5LuH5oGo.v: Never provoke a heart full of hate.

5LiN6KaB5rOo6KeG552A5oiR6YeR5bGe6Z2Z6ISJ.k: 不要注视着我金属静脉里缓缓流淌的毒液，这是警告。
5LiN6KaB5rOo6KeG552A5oiR6YeR5bGe6Z2Z6ISJ.v: Don't say anything about the poison. I mean it.

5LiN6KaB552A5oCl5YmN6L+b77yM55yL55yL6YKj.k: 不要着急前进，看看那是什么？嘿嘿，我们找到了一个迷宫，这个世界中，每一个迷宫，可都是充满了财富和机遇的。
5LiN6KaB552A5oCl5YmN6L+b77yM55yL55yL6YKj.v: Hold a second, is that an entrance to a Maze? Always explore a Maze if you can, they're a good source of Coins and EXP.

5ZCs5a6M6L+Z6aaW5puy5a2Q77yM5YaN5LiK6Lev.k: 听完这首曲子，再上路吧。

5ZCs6LW35p2l5Lmf5LiN5piv5b6I6Zq+5Zib77yB.v: This is actually easier than it sounds!

5ZC46KGA5Y+R5Yqo5pe26aKd5aSW5aKe5Yqg5omA.k: 吸血发动时额外增加所吸取生命值#0%的攻击力(自身攻击力超过2000时无法生效)

5ZC8LOS6uuexuz8=.v: Puny humans! You dare challenge me? I'll swallow you whole!

5ZC8fiHkuI3orrrnlJ/mrbvvvIznu53kuI3lsYjm.v: I will never surrender, even in death!

5ZC84oCm4oCm5oiR5Lya5ouN5pWj5L2g55qE6aqo.k: 吼……我会拍散你的骨头,用我的手掌.

5ZC85ZC85ZC877yM6L+Z5qyh5L2g5Lus5q275a6a.k: 吼吼吼，这次你们死定了。

5ZC85ZC877yM5bCP5a2Q77yM5L2g5oiQ6ZW/55qE.k: 吼吼，小子，你成长的有点快啊，不愧是那个人。
5ZC85ZC877yM5bCP5a2Q77yM5L2g5oiQ6ZW/55qE.v: Interesting. You've grown since I last met you. I suppose that is to be expected.

5ZC877yM5aSp5aCC5pyJ6Lev5L2g5LiN6LWw77yM.k: 吼，天堂有路你不走，地狱无门你偏闯进来。
5ZC877yM5aSp5aCC5pyJ6Lev5L2g5LiN6LWw77yM.v: You could've had it easy, but you chose the hard way.

5ZC877yM5pyJ5oiR5Zyo77yM6LCB6YO95Yir5oOz.k: 吼，有我在，谁都别想过去。
5ZC877yM5pyJ5oiR5Zyo77yM6LCB6YO95Yir5oOz.v: While I am here, none shall pass!

5ZC877yM6Ieq5LuO5pyJ5LqG6Z6t54Ku5ZKM5pil.k: 吼，自从有了鞭炮和春联，我都吃素好多年了。
5ZC877yM6Ieq5LuO5pyJ5LqG6Z6t54Ku5ZKM5pil.v: I haven't tasted fresh meat in decades. How I miss those days...

5ZC877yM6K6p5L2g5Lus5bCd5bCd5oiR55qE5Y6J.k: 吼，让你们尝尝我的厉害。
5ZC877yM6K6p5L2g5Lus5bCd5bCd5oiR55qE5Y6J.v: I'll show you the true meaning of strength!

5ZG15ZG15ZG177yM5L2g5Lus5bGF54S25Y+I6Lef.k: 呵呵呵，你们居然又跟上来了，看来有人指引啊。
5ZG15ZG15ZG177yM5L2g5Lus5bGF54S25Y+I6Lef.v: You again? Who's informing you of my whereabouts?

5ZG15ZG177yM5L2g5Lus5p2l5LqG44CC5p2l5p2l.k: 呵呵，你们来了。来来来，靠近点，我有些话要和你们说。
5ZG15ZG177yM5L2g5Lus5p2l5LqG44CC5p2l5p2l.v: Ah, good to see you! Come closer. I've got something for you...

5ZG15ZG177yM5aW95aW95LyR5oGv5ZCn77yM5YaN.k: 呵呵，好好休息吧，再也不要醒来了。
5ZG15ZG177yM5aW95aW95LyR5oGv5ZCn77yM5YaN.v: Rest in peace, for all of eternity.

5ZG15ZG177yM5oiR5ZKM5LiA6Iis55qE57K+54G1.k: 呵呵，我和一般的精灵有点不同，我偶尔会控制不住自然元素……
5ZG15ZG177yM5oiR5ZKM5LiA6Iis55qE57K+54G1.v: I am different from most Faen. Sometimes I lose control...

5ZG15ZG177yM6ISG5byx55qE5a625LyZ77yM5LiN.k: 呵呵，脆弱的家伙，不要做徒劳的尝试了。
5ZG15ZG177yM6ISG5byx55qE5a625LyZ77yM5LiN.v: Give in to the inevitable, little one. You know it's hopeless.

5ZG877yM5oiR6IO955yL5Yiw5L2g55qE54G16a2C.k: 呼，我能看到你的灵魂，它在等待我的爱抚……

5ZG877yM5oiR6L+96Liq56aB6ZSi6ZWj6ZOQ5Yiw.k: 呼，我追踪禁锢镣铐到了这里，却被她用幽冥之火燃烧了整个港口，浓烟遮蔽了我的眼睛，暂时无法视物了。你们要小心。
5ZG877yM5oiR6L+96Liq56aB6ZSi6ZWj6ZOQ5Yiw.v: I chased the Captivator here, but that wily woman set the whole area ablaze and blinded me with the smoke. Stay alert.

5ZG877yM5oiR6aKg6aKg5Y+I5Y+o5Y+o77yM5Zad.k: 呼，我颠颠又叨叨，喝的再多也不倒。唔，再来一杯。
5ZG877yM5oiR6aKg6aKg5Y+I5Y+o5Y+o77yM5Zad.v: Burp! I'm not drunk yet! Go get me another drink!

5ZG96L+Q5bm26Z2e5LiO55Sf5L+x5p2l55qE5peg.k: 命运并非与生俱来的无折无曲，我可以撼动命运前进的方向。
5ZG96L+Q5bm26Z2e5LiO55Sf5L+x5p2l55qE5peg.v: Nature is like the Fates; unpredictable but never fickle. I can portent her direction and guide her when she needs to.

5ZKM5oiR5LiA6LW35Lqr5Y+X5Liw5pS255qE5Zac.k: 和我一起享受丰收的喜悦吧

5ZKM5oiR5LiA6LW355eb5b+r5b6X54yO5p2A6a2U.k: 和我一起痛快得猎杀魔物吧
5ZKM5oiR5LiA6LW355eb5b+r5b6X54yO5p2A6a2U.v: Want to hunt some demons with me?

5ZKU77yM5ZKU77yM5ZKU4oCm4oCmKOeci+edgOaI.k: 咔，咔，咔……(看着我，献上你的灵魂)
5ZKU77yM5ZKU77yM5ZKU4oCm4oCmKOeci+edgOaI.v: Your soul is a fitting sacrifice.

5ZKm77yM5L2g55yL5LiN5Yiw5oiR6KKr5oG254G1.k: 咦，你看不到我被恶灵缠绕吗？你不攻击我？
5ZKm77yM5L2g55yL5LiN5Yiw5oiR6KKr5oG254G1.v: Can't you see that I'm possessed? You won't attack me?

5ZKm77yM5Y+I5piv6L+Z5Liq5aSn5Y+U77yf56Kw.k: 咦，又是这个大叔？碰见他的概率比中彩票概率还高呀！一定有问题。
5ZKm77yM5Y+I5piv6L+Z5Liq5aSn5Y+U77yf56Kw.v: It's that drunk panda again. Why are we running into him everywhere?

5ZKm77yM5oCO5LmI5Y+I5LiA6YGT57u/5YWJ6Zeq.k: 咦，怎么又一道绿光闪烁，我一定是热昏了今天。
5ZKm77yM5oCO5LmI5Y+I5LiA6YGT57u/5YWJ6Zeq.v: More green light? I must have been under the weather lately.

5ZKm77yM5oCO5LmI5aSp5Y+I6buR5LqG77yf6L+Z.k: 咦，怎么天又黑了？这次一定是错觉了吧。
5ZKm77yM5oCO5LmI5aSp5Y+I6buR5LqG77yf6L+Z.v: The sky's turning dark again. Is this another illusion?

5ZKm77yM6L+Z5LiN5piv57ue5p2A6I2G5qOY5ZCX.v: Huh, isn't this the Poison Ivy?

5ZKm77yM6L+Z5Liq5Lq65oCO5LmI5ZKM5oiR5Lus.k: 咦，这个人怎么和我们的元素召唤师一样？
5ZKm77yM6L+Z5Liq5Lq65oCO5LmI5ZKM5oiR5Lus.v: Huh, why is this person just like our Stormkallar?

5ZKm77yM6YKj5piv6Zu356We77yf6Zu356We55qE.k: 咦，那是雷神？雷神的雷电，据说是怨灵的克星，不知道他能否帮助我们摆脱困境。
5ZKm77yM6YKj5piv6Zu356We77yf6Zu356We55qE.v: That's Thor? His lightning is the bane of the Mortii!

5ZKm77yM6YKj6L655aW95YOP5omT6LW35p2l5LqG.k: 咦，那边好像打起来了。我们赶紧走远点。
5ZKm77yM6YKj6L655aW95YOP5omT6LW35p2l5LqG.v: It seems like a fight's going on over there. Let's avoid it if we can.

5ZKz5ZKz5ZKz77yM6LCi6LCi77yM6YKj5bCx6bq7.k: 咳咳咳，谢谢，那就麻烦诸位了。
5ZKz5ZKz5ZKz77yM6LCi6LCi77yM6YKj5bCx6bq7.v: Very well, be quick about it.

5ZOH77yM5L2g5LiN55+l6YGT5aW95aWH5a6z5q27.k: 哇，你不知道好奇害死猫嘛！
5ZOH77yM5L2g5LiN55+l6YGT5aW95aWH5a6z5q27.v: Curiosity killed the cat, you know!

5ZOH77yM5aSp5aKD55yf5piv576O5LiN6IOc5pS2.k: 哇，天境真是美不胜收啊。这里看起来，好像没有战斗的痕迹嘛，太平得很。咦，又是你。
5ZOH77yM5aSp5aKD55yf5piv576O5LiN6IOc5pS2.v: Wow, the beauty of Devagati is stunning. There are no scars of war here, everything is at peace. Huh, it's you again.

5ZOH77yM5aW95ryC5Lqu55qE5a6d55+z77yM6L+Z.k: 哇，好漂亮的宝石，这一定是传说中的海洋之心了.（\(^o^)/~）
5ZOH77yM5aW95ryC5Lqu55qE5a6d55+z77yM6L+Z.v: Such a lovely looking jewel. This must be the legendary Ocean's Core.

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Y+y6I6x5aeG77yM6L+Z.k: 哈哈哈哈，史莱姆，这次应该是第四次吧。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Y+y6I6x5aeG77yM6L+Z.v: You again? This must be the fourth time.

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Lq657G777yM5L2g5Lus5pyA.k: 哈哈哈，人类，你们最是怯懦贪婪，所以才会被我迷惑，才会幻象丛生。你们注定要被我们奴役。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Lq657G777yM5L2g5Lus5pyA.v: Hahaha! Humans are weak and greedy beings. That is why they fall under my spell. We shall exterminate them with ease!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Y+s5ZSk5biI77yM5LuK5aSp.k: 哈哈哈，召唤师，今天就是你的末日。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Y+s5ZSk5biI77yM5LuK5aSp.v: Prepare to meet your end, summoner!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5Zyo5oiR5Lus5by65oKN55qE.k: 哈哈哈，在我们强悍的攻击力前颤抖吧。

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5aW955y85YWJ77yM6L+Z5bCx.k: 哈哈哈，好眼光，这就是专门为你准备的！
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5aW955y85YWJ77yM6L+Z5bCx.v: Haha, you have a good eye. This box is prepared specially for you!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5bCP5Y+y6I6x5aeG77yM56ys.k: 哈哈哈，小史莱姆，第五次。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5bCP5Y+y6I6x5aeG77yM56ys.v: Hahaha! Come on, you ugly thing! That's five times now!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5oSa6KCi55qE5Lq657G777yM.k: 哈哈哈，愚蠢的人类，等待我的大军将你们淹没吧。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5oSa6KCi55qE5Lq657G777yM.v: Haha, foolish Humans. My troops will overwhelm you.

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5q2k6Lev5piv5oiR5byA77yM.k: 哈哈哈，此路是我开，此树是我栽，要打此处过，留下买路财。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM5q2k6Lev5piv5oiR5byA77yM.v: Hahaha! You're on my grandfather's road! Stand and deliver!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM57+g57u/5qKm5aKD77yM56We.k: 哈哈哈，翠绿梦境，神讯中的第一个火，我们已经激活了。走，目标雪域。
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM57+g57u/5qKm5aKD77yM56We.v: Well, that settles the fire. Now for the ice. On to the snowlands!

5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM6LeR5b6X5o6J5ZCX77yf5ri6.k: 哈哈哈，跑得掉吗？渺小的人类，居然自投罗网，进入了我的噬心营地
5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI77yM6LeR5b6X5o6J5ZCX77yf5ri6.v: Haha, you pitiful Humans must be real dumb to run straight into my trap. You can't escape now!

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus5Lit6K6h5LqG77yM55+l.k: 哈哈，你们中计了，知道这是什么法阵吗？我告诉你们，这是怨~灵~法~阵！！！
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus5Lit6K6h5LqG77yM55+l.v: Hah! You've fallen into my magical trap!

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus5p2l5pma5LqG77yM5L2g.k: 哈哈，你们来晚了，你们那些所谓的高手，估计都已经死伤殆尽了吧。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus5p2l5pma5LqG77yM5L2g.v: You're too late. Those so-called champions of yours are either dead or dying.

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus6L+Z5bCP6Lqr5p2/77yM.k: 哈哈，你们这小身板，看我的随从一回合送你们回老家。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5L2g5Lus6L+Z5bCP6Lqr5p2/77yM.v: With that scrawny body of yours, my creatures will send you packing in just one round.

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5YmN5pa55bCx5piv5Lqh54G15YWD.k: 哈哈，前方就是亡灵元帅和他的大将了。开战之前，先让我老人家看看你成长到什么样了。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5YmN5pa55bCx5piv5Lqh54G15YWD.v: The Wraith Lord and his commanders are just up ahead. Before you go into battle, let me check how much you've learned.

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5bm76LGh77yM5oOz6L+35oOR5oiR.k: 哈哈，幻象，想迷惑我恶魔猎手。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5bm76LGh77yM5oOz6L+35oOR5oiR.v: Bewitch me? The Devil Hunter? Naive.

5ZOI5ZOI77yM5rC05pm25qKm5aKD5bCx5Zyo6L+Z.k: 哈哈，水晶梦境就在这个家伙背后，搞定它我就可以回家了。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM5rC05pm25qKm5aKD5bCx5Zyo6L+Z.v: The Pearl Dreamscape is right behind this guy! All I've got to do is defeat him!

5ZOI5ZOI77yM6LaK5p2l6LaK5Y6J5a6z5LqG77yM.k: 哈哈，越来越厉害了，那我就放心了，有缘再见。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM6LaK5p2l6LaK5Y6J5a6z5LqG77yM.v: Haha, you are pretty strong! I'm relieved now. Run along!

5ZOI5ZOI77yM6L+Z5Liq5Y+y6I6x5aeG5Lmf5LiN.k: 哈哈，这个史莱姆也不怎么强嘛。
5ZOI5ZOI77yM6L+Z5Liq5Y+y6I6x5aeG5Lmf5LiN.v: Haha, this slime blob isn't that powerful after all.

5ZOO5ZGA77yM6K6p5byA77yM5oiR5oCl552A5a6M.k: 哎呀，让开，我急着完成使命回家呢。
5ZOO5ZGA77yM6K6p5byA77yM5oiR5oCl552A5a6M.v: Hey, get out of the way! I'm busy trying to complete my mission and get home.

5ZOO5ZOf77yM55WF5b+r44CC5Zad5LqG6YWS6L+Q.k: 哎哟，畅快。喝了酒运动运动，果然舒服啊。

5aaC5p6c5L2g5YCS5Zyo5oiR55qE5omL5LiL77yM.v: Grovel before me and I'll grant you a swift death.

5aaC5p6c5L2g55yL5Yiw5oiR77yM5L2g5Y+v6IO9.k: 如果你看到我，你可能已经面临深渊。

5aaC5p6c5L2g6L+Y5rS7552A77yM6YKj5LiA5a6a.k: 如果你还活着，那一定是我还没动手。
5aaC5p6c5L2g6L+Y5rS7552A77yM6YKj5LiA5a6a.v: If you're still breathing, it means I haven't made my move yet.

5aaC5p6c5Y+q5piv6aWl6aW/77yM6YKj5LmI5oiR.k: 如果只是饥饿，那么我不想看到愤怒。
5aaC5p6c5Y+q5piv6aWl6aW/77yM6YKj5LmI5oiR.v: If that is only Hunger, I never want to see Anger.

5aaC5p6c5oiR5rKh54yc6ZSZ55qE6K+d77yM5a6M.k: 如果我没猜错的话，完成你的使命，需要进入几个梦境，而梦境的开始，源于火和冰两种元素。火和冰，呵呵，我想应该就是炙日沙漠和凋零雪域了吧。
5aaC5p6c5oiR5rKh54yc6ZSZ55qE6K+d77yM5a6M.v: If I'm not wrong, you'll need to enter several Dreamscapes to fulfill your mission. It all begins with Fire and Ice? That must mean the Harsh Desert and Tundramados.

5aaE5Zu+6amx5pWj5o6J6K6p5L2g5q2i5q2l5LiN.k: 妄图驱散掉让你止步不前的咒语吗？那都是徒劳。
5aaE5Zu+6amx5pWj5o6J6K6p5L2g5q2i5q2l5LiN.v: Dispel the curse? You're wasting your effort.

5aiB6IOB5pyJ55So77yM6L+Y6ZyA6KaB5rOV5a6Y.k: 威胁有用，还需要法官吗？亡灵真幼稚。
5aiB6IOB5pyJ55So77yM6L+Y6ZyA6KaB5rOV5a6Y.v: If threats can work, why would we need laws? The Mortii are really naive.

5a6J6K+m5b6X5Zyo5oiR55qE5q2M5aOw5Lit5q27.k: 安详得在我的歌声中死去吧
5a6J6K+m5b6X5Zyo5oiR55qE5q2M5aOw5Lit5q27.v: Listen to the melody of death

5a6M5ZaE5L2g55qE5rOV5pyv77yM54S25ZCO5p2A.k: 完善你的法术，然后杀光所有拒绝拥抱你的人。
5a6M5ZaE5L2g55qE5rOV5pyv77yM54S25ZCO5p2A.v: Grow, get stronger, and kill everyone who made you cry.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM5L2g55qE6a2U5rOV5a+55oiR.k: 对不起，你的魔法对我无效。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM5L2g55qE6a2U5rOV5a+55oiR.v: Your pitiful magics will not work on me.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM5YaS5pin5LqG44CC5oiR5Y2z.k: 对不起，冒昧了。我即将前往修谱瑞姆地狱去指挥战斗，所以需要确定你——即将成为我伙伴的人，是真正的强者。很好，你没有让我失望。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM5YaS5pin5LqG44CC5oiR5Y2z.v: Sorry for the abrupt welcome. I am heading to Inferno to take command of the battle and I needed to ensure that my soon-to-be partner can carry their own weight. You certainly passed the test.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5Lul5Li65L2g5Lus5Lmf.k: 对不起，我以为你们也是他们那样的。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5Lul5Li65L2g5Lus5Lmf.v: Sorry, I thought you were like them.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5Lul5Li65L2g5Lus5piv.k: 对不起，我以为你们是复活的亡灵。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5Lul5Li65L2g5Lus5piv.v: Sorry about that, I thought you were another Mortii come back to life.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5pyJ54K55rSB55mW77yM.k: 对不起，我有点洁癖，只愿意接近纯洁的处女。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM5oiR5pyJ54K55rSB55mW77yM.v: Only those pure of heart and unbroken of body can approach me.

5a+55LiN6LW377yM6L+Z6L655Lmf5LiN5piv5L2g.k: 对不起，这边也不是你们可以走的。
5a+55LiN6LW377yM6L+Z6L655Lmf5LiN5piv5L2g.v: I will not allow myself to be defeated by the likes of you.

5a+55LqO55yL5LiN5riF5oiY5bGA55qE5Lq65p2l.k: 对于看不清战局的人来说，世界完全是另一番面貌。
5a+55LqO55yL5LiN5riF5oiY5bGA55qE5Lq65p2l.v: The world is different for those who cannot, or will not, see the battlefield.

5a+55LqO6YKj5Lqb5bey57uP5rKh5pyJ6Z2i5a2U.k: 对于那些已经没有面孔的人们，就算只是偶尔也好，请想起他们的事。
5a+55LqO6YKj5Lqb5bey57uP5rKh5pyJ6Z2i5a2U.v: Even if they are the faceless ones, do spare a thought for them every once in a while.

我宁愿我们没看到它。传说中，凡被此灯照见的人，将九死一生。
绞杀荆棘：哼，不是九死一生，是必死无疑。
5oiR5a6B5oS/5oiR5Lus5rKh55yL5Yiw5a6D44CC.v:
We must not look at that lamp! Legend says that almost everyone who saw that cursed lamp died miserably!
Poison Ivy: Correction, everyone who saw that lamp did die miserably.

5oiR5pu+5ri05pyb55qE5LiA5YiH6LWL5LqI5oiR.k: 我曾渴望的一切赋予我恐怖的意志。
5oiR5pu+5ri05pyb55qE5LiA5YiH6LWL5LqI5oiR.v: Everything shall submit to my will!

5oiR5pyA6L+R5LiN5YaN57K+56We5YiG6KOC5LqG.k: 我最近不再精神分裂了，我和我都过得很好。
5oiR5pyA6L+R5LiN5YaN57K+56We5YiG6KOC5LqG.v: Both of us are doing well. There's two of us here!

5oiR5pyJ5Y6L5YCS5Lq657G755qE6KeG5q275aaC.k: 我有压倒人类的视死如归的勇气，以彼之血，为我之命。
5oiR5pyJ5Y6L5YCS5Lq657G755qE6KeG5q275aaC.v: The days of the living are at their end. The dead shall walk and the world will belong to the Mortii!

5oiR5q+P5qyh5bCE5Ye6M+aUr+eureefouOAguS4.v: It only takes three arrows to slay you. The first punctures your lungs, the second boils your blood, and the third reduces you to ashes.

5oiR5rKh5pyJ54G16a2C77yM5L2G5oiR5Y+v5Lul.k: 我没有灵魂，但我可以带走你的灵魂。
5oiR5rKh5pyJ54G16a2C77yM5L2G5oiR5Y+v5Lul.v: I have no soul for you to take, but you have one for me.

5oiR5rS75LqG6L+Z5LmI5aSa5bm077yM5oiR6L+Y.k: 我活了这么多年，我还会依旧这么活下去。
5oiR5rS75LqG6L+Z5LmI5aSa5bm077yM5oiR6L+Y.v: I have lived for many ages and will live for many more.

5oiR5ri45puz5Zyo6LCO6KiA5ZKM6aqX5bGA5Lit.k: 我游曳在谎言和骗局中汲取能量。
5oiR5ri45puz5Zyo6LCO6KiA5ZKM6aqX5bGA5Lit.v: Lies and deception are the source of my power.

5oiR55Sf5rCU5pe277yM5LqL5oOF5Lya5Y+Y5b6X.v: Anger may make things worse, but inaction will not make anything better.

5oiR55qE5Li75Lq6LOiwgemDveWIq+aDs+S8pOWu.k: 我的主人,谁都别想伤害我的主人
5oiR55qE5Li75Lq6LOiwgemDveWIq+aDs+S8pOWu.v: mY.. MAsTEr... sTAy AwAy FROm mY MAsTEr!

5oiR55qE5Yal6Ii56L+Y562J552A6YCB5L2g5LiA.k: 我的冥船还等着送你一程。

5oiR55qE5YiG6KOC55eH5bey57uP5rK75aW95LqG.k: 我的分裂症已经治好了，我和我都过得很好。

5oiR55qE5YmR5Lya5ZGK6K+J5oiR5L2g55qE5omA.k: 我的剑会告诉我你的所在，别想逃过我们的斩杀
5oiR55qE5YmR5Lya5ZGK6K+J5oiR5L2g55qE5omA.v: With my holy blade, Gram, I shall slay Fafnir!

5oiR55qE5oqA6IO977yM5a+55LqO5oCS5rCU6LaK.k: 我的技能，对于怒气越强大的英雄，威胁越大。
5oiR55qE5oqA6IO977yM5a+55LqO5oCS5rCU6LaK.v: The higher my opponent's Rage, the deadlier my skill becomes.

5oiR55qE54yO54mp5piv57ud5a+56YCD6ISx5LiN.k: 我的猎物是绝对逃脱不了死亡的

5oiR55qE55y86YeM5Y+q5pyJ5LiA5Liq5L2g77yM.k: 我的眼里只有一个你，即将死去的你。

5oiR55qE6ISR55Oc5a2Q6YeM6KOF55qE5piv5L2g.k: 我的脑瓜子里装的是你的灵魂
5oiR55qE6ISR55Oc5a2Q6YeM6KOF55qE5piv5L2g.v: Imprisoning your soul is the only thing on my mind.

5oiR55qE6Iux6ZuE5Li75LmJ77yM5LqL5a6e5LiK.k: 我的英雄主义，事实上，就是我用双手犯下的暴行。
5oiR55qE6Iux6ZuE5Li75LmJ77yM5LqL5a6e5LiK.v: My philosophy is simple: My way or my fists.

5oiR55qE6K+d5bCx5piv5L2g6ZyA6KaB5oGq5a6I.v: My very words are a doctrine for which you'd do well to abide!

5oiR55qE6Lqr5LiK77yM5pyJ54uu6bmr5LiA5peP.k: 我的身上，有狮鹫一族的荣光，所以我是不会失败的。

5oiR55qE6aqR5p6q77yM5a6D55qE5Yip54iq77yM.k: 我的骑枪，它的利爪，总有一样你会害怕。

5oiR55qE6a2U5YG255Sf5rCU5LqGLOS9oOS7rOWP.k: 我的魔偶生气了,你们可要小心点

5oiR55yL5LuW5Lus55qE6Zi15a6577yM6L+Z5piv.k: 我看他们的阵容，这是一次难得的经验，我带你看看冰甲和暴击的对抗。

5oiR552A6L+35LqO5q275Lqh77yM5Lul6Iez5LqO.v: The Mortii have been blessed, and I hope to receive that same blessing.

5oiR55+l6YGT5L2g5Lus5Li65L2V6ICM5p2l77yM.k: 我知道你们为何而来，但是在我们的地盘，你休想达成这个目的。
5oiR55+l6YGT5L2g5Lus5Li65L2V6ICM5p2l77yM.v: I know why you're here. But this is my territory and I will not let you succeed.

5oiR55+l6YGT5pq05Yqb5LiN6IO96Kej5Yaz6Zeu.v: I know violence doesn't solve anything, but that won't stop me from beating the hell out of you!

5oiR6ICB5Lq65a625LuO5aSn6ICB6L+c55qE5Lic.v: Poor old me came all the way from the East to help the allies, only to be beaten up by you? This is unjust!

5oiR6IO95aSf5o6M5o6n5pW05Liq5LiW55WM4oCU.v: I can, and I should, rule this world.

5oiR6Iie5Yqo55qE57+F6IaA5bCG5Lya6L+35oOR.k: 我舞动的翅膀将会迷惑你的心灵
5oiR6Iie5Yqo55qE57+F6IaA5bCG5Lya6L+35oOR.v: None have witnessed my dance and live to tell the tale!

5oiR6KaB5a6I5Y2r6L+Z6YeM55qE5LiA5YiH44CC.k: 我要守卫这里的一切。嗯，我不怕坏人。
5oiR6KaB5a6I5Y2r6L+Z6YeM55qE5LiA5YiH44CC.v: I will protect this place! I'm not afraid!

5oiR6KaB6K6p5aSn5Zyw6YO95Li65oiR6aKk5oqW.k: 我要让大地都为我颤抖。

5oiR6K6w5LiN5riF6Ieq5bex5a2Y5Zyo5LqG5aSa.k: 我记不清自己存在了多久，但是我记得这个世界每次的变迁。

5oiR6K+077yM5Yir5oOz6L+b5Y6757K+54G15LmL.v: You will never get into Selene'ndal.

5oiR6Lqy5Zyo6buR5pqX5Lit6Z2Z6Z2Z55yL552A.k: 我躲在黑暗中静静看着你死去
5oiR6Lqy5Zyo6buR5pqX5Lit6Z2Z6Z2Z55yL552A.v: You'll be dead before you spot me!

5oiR6YO96K+05LqG5piv6K+v5Lya5LqG77yM5L2g.k: 我都说了是误会了，你好好照看王权壁垒吧。

5oiR6aOO5bCY5LuG5LuG56m/6LaK5Lqk6ZSZ55qE.k: 我风尘仆仆穿越交错的时空，只为寻找一个人。但你们是谁，为什么出现在我面前？

5oiY5LqJ5oC75piv5peg5q2i5aKD5b6X5Zyo54eD.v: The embers of war shall burn for eternity!

5oiY5paX5Zue5ZCI5pWw5aSn5LqOMTYs5pyA5aSa.v: May be cast up to 2 times if you make it past Round 16.

5oiY5qCX5ZCn77yB5oGQ5oOn5Lit6Iuf5rS755qE.k: 战栗吧！恐惧中苟活的懦夫。

5oiY5q2755qE6ZqP5LuO5Lya6L+b5YWl5aKT5Zyw.v: You know you are in for a tough battle when you're up against an opponent who can revive Creatures from the graveyard.

5oiY54yq5piv6YeO6Juu5ZKG5ZOu5LuO5bCP5Z+5.v: Berserker summons a powerful Boar that boosts the Hero's Rage while also increasing the ATK of your other Creatures.

5oiY6ICF77yM5oiW5Li66I2j6ICA77yM5oiW5Li6.k: 战者，或为荣耀，或为赞颂。
5oiY6ICF77yM5oiW5Li66I2j6ICA77yM5oiW5Li6.v: To the victor goes the spoils.

5oiY6ICF77yM6ISK5p+x5LiN5bGI77yM6I2j6ICA.k: 战者，脊柱不屈，荣耀不倒。

5omA5Y+X5Yiw55qE5pmu6YCa5pS75Ye75Lyk5a6z.k: 所受到的普通攻击伤害减少#0%后再额外减少#1点

5omA5bGe5Yq/5Yqb6I635b6X5rS75Yqo6IOc5Yip.v: Your Faction has won the Faction War!

5omA5pyJ55qE54G+6Zq+77yM6YO95rqQ5LqO5LiN.k: 所有的灾难，都源于不安分。灵魂的折磨，将始于错误的选择。年轻人，忏悔吧。
5omA5pyJ55qE54G+6Zq+77yM6YO95rqQ5LqO5LiN.v: Unrest leads to catastrophe. A tortured soul often makes the wrong choices. You are young, repent while you still can.

5omL6YeM5YmR77yM6K6p5oiR5peg5omA55WP5oOn.v: With my sword in hand, I feel no fear.

5omT5LiN5omT5b6X6L+H77yM6YO95b6X5omT44CC.v: Win or lose, we must fight.

5omT5p625aeQ5LuO5p2l5rKh5oCV6L+H77yM5LiN.k: 打架姐从来没怕过，不用太多废话，你们一起放马过来吧。
5omT5p625aeQ5LuO5p2l5rKh5oCV6L+H77yM5LiN.v: Only death is eternal. Resistance is futile.

5omT6LSl5a6D77yM5oiR55yL5Yiw5ber5aaW5LmL.k: 打败它，我看到巫妖之祸了，就在前面。

5om+5Yiw6IGU5Yab55qE546L5a2Q4oCU4oCU546L.k: 找到联军的王子——王权壁垒，他会指引你们继续前进的。
